title: Bircher muesli

ingredients.content: 40 g whole mixed nuts (e.g almonds, hazelnuts, macadamias)
40 g mixed dried fruit (e.g fig, cranberries, dates)
1 Granny Smith apple, unpeeled, core removed, cut into quarters (approx. 95 g)
fresh mixed fruit (e.g. pomegranate, strawberries, blueberries), to serve

preparations.content: Place rolled oats, apple juice, cinnamon and nutmeg into ThermoServer and leave to soak overnight in the refrigerator.
Transfer soaked muesli mix into a large bowl or divide between individual serving bowls.
Place nuts, desiccated coconut and dried fruit into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5.5<b>. Pour over muesli mix.
Place Granny Smith apple into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 6<b>. Pour over muesli and dried fruit mix and gently incorporate.
Serve with a dollop of Greek yoghurt per portion and fresh fruit of choice.

hintsAndTricks: Bircher muesli can be made the day before for extra ease in the morning. Proceed as per recipe up to step 4, then transfer oats and dried fruit mixture into ThermoServer or an airtight container and place into the refrigerator overnight. The next morning, continue with steps 4-5.
